channel.title: Syntax :: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: The syntax of Go is reduced. It is easy to learn and read.

item.title: Basic
item.description: Data types bool string int, int8, int16, int32, int64 uint, uint8, uint16, uint32, uint64 byte, rune, float32, float64 complex64, complex128 Variables Naming of variables are follow the Camel Case style. Depending on their lifecycle, a name should be short or long. Abbreviations should be written in uppercase in one exception, when they are not public. var num int // def. w/o value var name string = "Rob Pike" // def. with value var count = 10 // def.
